title: Project-Based Entrepreneurship Competency Development Curriculum for IT Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in IT and basic business management knowledge
context.additional_context: Projects for in-service IT professionals to refine entrepreneurial ideas based on technical competencies and develop actionable business models

learning_goals: Learners can concretize technology-based startup ideas into business plans through feasibility analysis.
Learners can be assessed on comprehensive business management competencies, including market analysis, financial planning, and risk management.
Through team-based projects, learners can demonstrate collaboration and communication skills.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
